type.name: org.gradle.plugins.ide.idea.model.IdeaModel
type.description:
* DSL-friendly model of the IDEA project information. * First point of entry when it comes to customizing the IDEA generation. *

* See the examples in docs for {@link IdeaModule} or {@link IdeaProject}.

method.name: getModule
method.description:
* Configures IDEA module information.

For examples see docs for {@link IdeaModule}.

method.name: getProject
method.description:
* Configures IDEA project information.

For examples see docs for {@link IdeaProject}.

method.name: getWorkspace
method.description:
* Configures IDEA workspace information. *

* For examples see docs for {@link IdeaWorkspace}.

method.name: module
method.description:
* Configures IDEA module information.

For examples see docs for {@link IdeaModule}.

method.name: pathVariables
method.description:
* Adds path variables to be used for replacing absolute paths in resulting files (*.iml, etc.).

For example see docs for {@link IdeaModule}. * * @param pathVariables A map with String->File pairs.

method.name: project
method.description:
* Configures IDEA project information.

For examples see docs for {@link IdeaProject}.

method.name: workspace
method.description:
* Configures IDEA workspace information.

For examples see docs for {@link IdeaWorkspace}.

property.name: module
property.description:
* Configures IDEA module information.

For examples see docs for {@link IdeaModule}.

property.name: project
property.description:
* Configures IDEA project information.

For examples see docs for {@link IdeaProject}.

property.name: workspace
property.description:
* Configures IDEA workspace information. *

* For examples see docs for {@link IdeaWorkspace}.
